title: Failed to create dump file: '' (error 5) and bugsplat FIX
body:
If anyone else is having a error 5 happening when trying to launch the client I have done many iterations of trial and error and have finally figured out what is causing the error and crash.

The error and crash is caused by Asus Sonic Studio sound driver (SupremeFX) made by Realtek. A simple solution to fixing this error is closing the sound card driver completely by going into the task bar and right clicking the Sonic Studio icon and clicking close. Your alpha client should now work normally. I have tested this to make sure that it this error is caused strictly from having this program open by testing it with a combination of different programs.

Before anyone asks yes, I have already submitted this to the Report A Bug form, this is just in case someone else is having this issue and wanted to know how to fix it before a patch was sent out.

**TL;DR** Close the Sonic Studio 2 application and the Batch 5 error disappears and the alpha client now works perfectly.

replies.body:
First off, to quote one of our super grateful engineers: "You are a {insert exciting adjective} saint!!!!!"

Second off, this actually was super helpful and we really appreciating you digging into this so fast!  Amazing work.

We're working on a beefier fix for you asap, and hope it makes it into the next build.

Keep on being an awesome alpha guardian!
Just a note for the engineers: it appears to be any program that deals with Realtek sound drivers, including nahemic.
yeah closed all programs based on nahimic  programs and is now working for the first time in 4 days...

Funny enough I actually still haven't gotten into the alpha client on this account, my main account.

But, no problem glad I was able to help and figure out an issue that I have had since I got into the Alpha Client on my smurf, during the first wave.

still praying for my devil teemo skin and that pbe key....
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Same problem with Nahimic 2 Sound Driver!{{summoner:13}}

Just pointing out that I just had this error and posted about it as well before finding this thread. My issue was with Nahimic(Spelling?) 2, which I assume is operating similarly. I went ahead and submitted a bug report with my email attached.
I have a fix as well. If you just keep clicking ok when the error pops up eventually its going to work. Thats what happened to me
This didnt fix it for me.. I still get the error. I have no audio processes running but I didnt close anything either, unless I cant find it I dont have one so Idk what to do.
Riot Codebear Does this mean I can finally get the Alpha Client for this account?
For MSI computer owners, the same is true accept the program to close is nahemic for MSI.....it seems anything that involves realtek sound drivers.
Thanks worked great on my MSI computer.
How do I close my nahimic drivers?  Or any drivers for that matter.
Nevermind, all I did was close the nahimic program and the alpha client is working.

I would like to know the answer to that question as well... I'm glad to have some kind of lead on the issue though.

EDIT: I just went to task manager and ended all tasks that had to do with Nahemic... so far everything is going fine, crossed fingers.
I had no idea what i was looking for/doing until i saw your comment. Thank you good sir. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Was looking for this, perfect.

This actually also seemed to help my laptop from randomly freezing while playing games as well.

Thank you!!
Oh this appears to have solved the issue for me.  Thank you very much.
No problem, glad I could be of help.
http://imgur.com/a/xEi4F im getting the game message pop up when i click the alpha client, i dont have a clue what to do{{summoner:3}}

if you have an error code like this just go year bottom right, click the small arrow that points to the top ridge and you right click on the icon Namehic "blue icon with a black has N inside "you left ridge. You restart the alpha client and everything will normally.
This fixed the issue for me. Thanks a lot man
No problem! Glad I could be of help.
except i dont know how to turn it back on
search realtek in your windows search and open it to turn it back on.
I'm still getting the error message when i start the client, but, the client actually starts up now without me having to end the specific processes
i am getting the same error as shown above but i don't have Asus Sonic Studio sound driver in my computer and i don't know how to fix it is there anything else that could help me fix this problem

Just Close the Nahimic software and it will works fine.

Mine is Nahimic for MSI.
i got the same problen joust now plz help

i had the same problem and i test on a fresh windows 10 installation with all not essential service closed.

i have asus mb, and not that hardware.

i try to uninstall audio driver and use the windows base driver, always not solve.

To me, seems that the problem is an har disk drive Hungry use of the latest patches of lol clients

i dont Always get this error just about 40% of the times im going in champ select, resulting in me getting the leaving penalty all the time. this is really starting to frustrate me, and has to my knowledge nothing to do with my sound, plz resolve this issue or do something with the way you get the penalty cuz this is just unfair
I have the same problem help pls, I was in champ select and I lost lp
Just had this error too and client crashed.
Just had this error in champ select and my client crashed.

I unfortunately did everything told by everyone in the comments, I still get the error but now I get 0 sound in the games, absolutely no sound. 
I check to make sure I didn't accidentally checked the box that says to "disable all sound" and I find that my sound is just not present. Which doesn't make sense....I'll try reinstalling but man...I hope this gets fixed in an update.
Hey, got same pb here with new beta client, closing Sonic Studio is the key. Cheers

All my drivers are up to date, I looked in task manager and manually checked to see if any of these programs were open and they are not, I ran client repairs but I still get the error. Please help me I want to play on the new client and soon its going to be mandatory and it wont work for me
But i dont have a sound card and i got an error so i re downloaded the client and then its still giving me errors as it is trying to update!
thank you so much it realy worked and now intotaly happy XD :D
WOO This fixed it for me! I should've looked here loong ago xD
Wow, this was frustrating me so much. Thanks for the fix, it worked great.
I actually got a Bug Splat instead of this error every time I tried to open the Alpha Client, but nonetheless I tried closing it (Nahimic for me, MSI), and tried to open Client again, and it worked.
Excellent work! Haven't been able to load the client at all and this fixed my issue. Many thanks!

This seems to happen with any sound driver, I had my Nahimic for MSI sound driver open and it would continuously create the dump file. Decided if it worked for the Sonic Studio sound driver, might work with my sound driver too and sure enough closed it and it stopped the error!

Sorry... 
I have a Dell computer, and I have no idea how I fix this.
Is there any other was thaat I can find out?
